verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and to his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, that they \w separate|strong="H5144"\w* themselves from the holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and that they \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* not my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add in those things\add* which they \w hallow|strong="H6942"\w* unto me: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Whosoever|strong="H0376"\w* \add he be\add* of all your \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* among your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*, that \w goeth|strong="H7126"\w* unto the holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, which the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w hallow|strong="H6942"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, having his \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* upon him, that \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from my \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*: I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

What man \w soever|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \add is\add* a \w leper|strong="H6879"\w*, or hath a running \w issue|strong="H2100"\w*; he shall not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of the holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, until he be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*. And whoso \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* any thing \add that is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \add by\add* the \w dead|strong="H5315"\w*, or a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* whose \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w goeth|strong="H3318"\w* from him;\f + \fr 22.4 \ft running…: Heb. running of the reins\f*

Or \w whosoever|strong="H0376"\w* \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* any creeping \w thing|strong="H8318"\w*, whereby he may be made \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*, or a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* of whom he may take \w uncleanness|strong="H2930"\w*, whatsoever \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* he hath;

The \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* which hath \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* any such shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until \w even|strong="H6153"\w*, and shall not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of the holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, \w unless|strong="H0518"\w* he \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* with \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

And when the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* is \w down|strong="H0935"\w*, he shall be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*, and shall \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of the holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*; because it \add is\add* his \w food|strong="H3899"\w*.

That which dieth of \w itself|strong="H5038"\w*, or is \w torn|strong="H2966"\w* \add with beasts\add*, he shall not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* to \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* himself therewith: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

They shall therefore \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* mine \w ordinance|strong="H4931"\w*, lest they \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w sin|strong="H2399"\w* for it, and \w die|strong="H4191"\w* therefore, if they \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* it: I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* do \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* them.

There shall no \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add of\add* the holy \w thing|strong="H6944"\w*: a \w sojourner|strong="H8453"\w* of the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, or an hired \w servant|strong="H7916"\w*, shall not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add of\add* the holy \w thing|strong="H6944"\w*.

But if the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \add any\add* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w with|strong="H7075"\w* his \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, he shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of it, and he that is \w born|strong="H3211"\w* in his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: they shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of his \w meat|strong="H3899"\w*.\f + \fr 22.11 \ft with…: Heb. with the purchase of his money\f*

If the \w priest’s|strong="H3548"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* also be \add married\add* unto a \w stranger|strong="H0376"\w*, she may not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of an \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* of the holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*.\f + \fr 22.12 \ft a stranger: Heb. a man a stranger\f*

But if the \w priest’s|strong="H3548"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* be a \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, or \w divorced|strong="H1644"\w*, and have no \w child|strong="H2233"\w*, and is \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* unto her \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, as in her \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, she shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of her \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w meat|strong="H3899"\w*: but there shall no \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof.

¶ And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add of\add* the holy \w thing|strong="H6944"\w* \w unwittingly|strong="H7684"\w*, then he shall \w put|strong="H3254"\w* the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \add part\add* thereof unto it, and shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* with the holy \w thing|strong="H6944"\w*.

And they shall not \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* the holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which they \w offer|strong="H7311"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*;

Or suffer them to \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of \w trespass|strong="H0819"\w*, when they \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* their holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*: for I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* do \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* them.\f + \fr 22.16 \ft suffer…: or, lade themselves with the iniquity of trespass in their eating\f*
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and to his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and unto all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Whatsoever|strong="H0376"\w* \add he be\add* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, or of the \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that will \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* his \w oblation|strong="H7133"\w* for all his \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*, and for all his freewill \w offerings|strong="H5071"\w*, which they will \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*;

\add Ye shall offer\add* at your own \w will|strong="H7522"\w* a \w male|strong="H2145"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*, of the \w beeves|strong="H1241"\w*, of the \w sheep|strong="H3775"\w*, or of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w*.
\add But\add* whatsoever hath a \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*, \add that\add* shall ye not \w offer|strong="H7126"\w*: for it shall not be \w acceptable|strong="H7522"\w* for you.

And \w whosoever|strong="H0376"\w* \w offereth|strong="H7126"\w* a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to \w accomplish|strong="H6381"\w* \add his\add* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w*, or a freewill \w offering|strong="H5071"\w* in \w beeves|strong="H1241"\w* or \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, it shall be \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w* to be \w accepted|strong="H7522"\w*; there shall be no \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w* therein.\f + \fr 22.21 \ft sheep: or, goats\f*

\w Blind|strong="H5788"\w*, or \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, or \w maimed|strong="H2782"\w*, or having a \w wen|strong="H2990"\w*, or \w scurvy|strong="H1618"\w*, or \w scabbed|strong="H3217"\w*, ye shall not \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* these unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, nor \w make|strong="H5414"\w* an offering by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* of them upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Either a \w bullock|strong="H7794"\w* or a \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w* that hath any thing \w superfluous|strong="H8311"\w* or lacking in his \w parts|strong="H7038"\w*, that mayest thou \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* \add for\add* a freewill \w offering|strong="H5071"\w*; but for a \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* it shall not be \w accepted|strong="H7521"\w*.\f + \fr 22.23 \ft lamb: or, kid\f*

Ye shall not \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that which is \w bruised|strong="H4600"\w*, or \w crushed|strong="H3807"\w*, or \w broken|strong="H5423"\w*, or \w cut|strong="H3772"\w*; neither shall ye \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \add any offering thereof\add* in your \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

Neither from a \w stranger’s|strong="H5236"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* shall ye \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of any of these; because their \w corruption|strong="H4893"\w* \add is\add* in them, \add and\add* \w blemishes|strong="H3971"\w* \add be\add* in them: they shall not be \w accepted|strong="H7521"\w* for you.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

When a \w bullock|strong="H7794"\w*, or a \w sheep|strong="H3775"\w*, or a \w goat|strong="H5795"\w*, is brought \w forth|strong="H3205"\w*, then it shall be \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* under the \w dam|strong="H0517"\w*; and from the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* and \w thenceforth|strong="H1973"\w* it shall be \w accepted|strong="H7521"\w* for an \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And \add whether it be\add* \w cow|strong="H7794"\w* or \w ewe|strong="H7716"\w*, ye shall not \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* it and her \w young|strong="H1121"\w* both in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 22.28 \ft ewe: or, she goat\f*

And when ye will \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* \add it\add* at your own \w will|strong="H7522"\w*.

On the same \w day|strong="H3117"\w* it shall be eaten \w up|strong="H0398"\w*; ye shall \w leave|strong="H3498"\w* none of it until the \w morrow|strong="H1242"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
Therefore shall ye \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Neither shall ye \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*; but I will be \w hallowed|strong="H6942"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* which \w hallow|strong="H6942"\w* you,
That brought you \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, to be your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
